name: Pull Request Diff Copy
friendlyName: Pull Request Diff Copy Cross Platform
description: Copy all changes in a Pull Request into a Diff folder
helpMarkDown: Copy all changes in a Pull Request into a Diff folder. This task must trigge by git pull request, [set target branch policy at first](https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/vsts/git/branch-policies?view=vsts#require-the-pull-request-to-build)
author: LEANSOFT

inputs.name: destination
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where files should be placed, a subfolder named [Content] will be placed to contain the files. And [diff.txt] will be created in the root.

inputs.name: contentGeneration
inputs.label: File List Generation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Controls if we are going to generate the content folder with all diffed files.

inputs.name: flatten
inputs.label: Flatten
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten directory structure (all files to same directory)

inputs.name: utf8withBOM
inputs.label: UTF-8 with BOM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include BOM with UTF-8 encoding for diff.txt file. [diff.txt] will always be written in UTF-8.
